title: Textile, 1920–40
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: satin damask, dip-dyed warp
inscribed: Attached label on A: "SILK reversible Brocatelle. Note: five different colorations of 3 color dip yarns used in the warp. Attached is one of the 3-color dip yarns used."
dimensions:
Warp x Weft: 138 x 130 cm (54 5/16 x 51 3/16 in.)
Repeat H (straight): 69.9 x 63.5 cm (27 1/2 x 25 in.)
Other diam (skein): 38 cm (14 15/16 in.)
creditline: Gift of Mrs. R. Curt Hasenclever
description:
A. Pattern of urns within sculptured scrolls. Red ,green and yellow dip-dyed warp and a turquoise weft. Grommets for showroom use at top.
B. skein of dip-dyed yarn. Red, green and yellow.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1920–40.
1920–40. Medium: silk
Technique: satin damask, dip-dyed warp. Gift of Mrs. R. Curt Hasenclever. 1979-9-38-a,b.
